page.title: 03MALLING HOUSING ESTATE
page.content: Malling is almost{built}up{to its {limit}and has been growing for over 50 years. The estate is divided into{old {and new}parts. Houses of varied styles are still being built in both areas. Many different people live in Malling including old people as there is a home for them. Other ammenities include a{school, newsagent, post {office}and{general stores.}People grow fruit and vegetables on{allotments. Children play in the many open spaces, two small{woods}and recreation{park. Malling Church is near to the{Sussex {Police Headquarters}whose private sports ground can only be used by the families of the police.{ {Malling is not very accessible}as there is only one road into it, being almost surrounded by the river Ouse which only has bridges in Lewes and Barcombe.
